entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Moosonee
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:49 p.m. EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of drizzle. Low zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of drizzle and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches. Low zero. Forecast issued 1:27 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of drizzle. High plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of drizzle. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. High plus 5. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 1:27 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries in the evening. Snow at times heavy beginning near midnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snowfall amount 10 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 1:27 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023
